title: Do you think Synthwave music will ever become more mainstream? - Quora

response.answer_text: It kinda did, but it may only be a one off thing. After years and years of bands making synthwave, finally a mainstream artists the Weekend pulled off a huge hit with Blinded By the Light. Its my hope that the originators like FM Attack gets propelled to the main stream that they so deserve. Stranger, My Life and Magic by FM Attack is brilliantly composed.
